content: from book s pattern description > i designed this because i wanted a > scarf that was warm and long enough so i could wrap it around my neck a > couple of times but still have length > in the front to show off the pretty > stitch work i also wanted the > scarf to be cute and feminine which > would be a nice change from the > mundane wool scarves i was seeing in > stores it s a perfect and pretty > pattern for a beginner
